00021 \file  f_cta_utils.h

00023 \brief String utility functions for FORTRAN / C compatibility.

00026 #include <string.h>
00027 #include "cta_system.h"
00028 #include "cta_datatypes.h"
00029 #include "cta_errors.h"
00030 
00031 #ifndef F_CTA_UTILS_H
00032 #define F_CTA_UTILS_H
00033 #ifdef __cplusplus
00034 extern "C" {
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 /** \brief Create C string from FORTRAN string
00038  *
00039  * \param f_str I pointer to FORTRAN string
00040  * \param c_str O buffer for receiving C string
00041  * \param len_f I length of FORTRAN string
00042  *
00043  * \return error status: always CTA_OK (no internal error check)
00044  */
00045 int CTA_fstr2cstr(char *f_str,char *c_str, int len_f);
00046 
00047 /** \brief Create FORTRAN string from C string
00048  *
00049  * \param c_str I pointer to C string
00050  * \param f_str O buffer for receiving FORTRAN string
00051  * \param len_f I length of C string
00052  *
00053  * \return error status: always CTA_OK (no internal error check)
00054  */
00055 int CTA_cstr2fstr(char *c_str,char *f_str, int len_f);
00056 
00057 
00058 #ifdef __cplusplus
00059 }
00060 #endif
00061 #endif
